queries.description: Ensure that storage is encrypted by KMS on instances that, based on their name, might host a database.

files.expected_value: Resources.DefaultDB.Properties.KmsKeyId should be defined with AWS-Managed CMK

queries.description: RDS must not be defined with public interface, which means the attribute 'PubliclyAccessible' must be set to false.

queries.query_name: DB Security Group with Public Scope
queries.description: The IP address in a DB Security Group must not be '0.0.0.0/0' (IPv4) or '::/0' (IPv6).
The HTTP port is open in a Security Group
IAM Database Auth Enabled must be configured to true

queries.query_name: Passwords And Secrets - AWS Access Key
queries.description: Query to find passwords and secrets in infrastructure code.

files.expected_value: Hardcoded secret key should not appear in source

queries.query_name: Passwords And Secrets - AWS Secret Key
queries.description: Query to find passwords and secrets in infrastructure code.

files.expected_value: Hardcoded secret key should not appear in source

queries.description: AWS RDS DB Instance should be encrypted

queries.query_name: S3 Bucket ACL Allows Read to All Users
queries.description: S3 Buckets sould not be readable and writable to all users

files.expected_value: S3 bucket should not have a public readable ACL
files.actual_value: S3 bucket 'DataBucket' has ACL set to 'PublicRead'

queries.description: If algorithm is AES256 then the master key is null, empty or undefined, otherwise the master key is required

queries.query_name: S3 Bucket Without SSL In Write Actions
queries.description: S3 Buckets should enforce encryption of data transfers using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

files.expected_value: Resources.LogsBucket bucket has a policy that enforces SSL
files.actual_value: Resources.LogsBucket bucket doesn't have a policy

files.expected_value: Resources.DataScienceBucket bucket has a policy that enforces SSL
files.actual_value: Resources.DataScienceBucket bucket doesn't have a policy

files.expected_value: Resources.DataBucket bucket has a policy that enforces SSL
files.actual_value: Resources.DataBucket bucket doesn't have a policy

files.expected_value: Resources.FinancialsBucket bucket has a policy that enforces SSL
files.actual_value: Resources.FinancialsBucket bucket doesn't have a policy

files.expected_value: Resources.OperationsBucket bucket has a policy that enforces SSL
files.actual_value: Resources.OperationsBucket bucket doesn't have a policy

queries.description: S3 Buckets should have server-side encryption at rest enabled to protect sensitive data
It's dangerous disabling a block public access settings in bucket or writing a bucket policy that grants public read access

queries.query_name: Security Group With Unrestricted Access To SSH
queries.description: Security Groups allows all traffic for SSH (port:22)

queries.query_name: Security Groups With Exposed Admin Ports
queries.description: Security Groups should not have ports open in (20, 21, 22, 23, 115, 137, 138, 139, 2049, 3389)

files.expected_value: None of the Resources.WebNodeSG.Properties.SecurityGroupIngress has an exposed port
files.actual_value: One of the Resources.WebNodeSG.Properties.SecurityGroupIngress has a too exposed port (20,21,22,23,115,137,138,2049,3389)

queries.description: AWS RDS should have automatic minor upgrades enabled, which means the attribute 'AutoMinorVersionUpgrade' must be set to true.
EBS volumes should be encrypted
EBS Volume should specify a KmsKeyId value

queries.query_name: EC2 Instance Has No IAM Role
queries.description: Check if an EC2 instance refers to an IAM profile, which represents an IAM Role.
EC2 Subnet should not have MapPublicIpOnLaunch set to true
IAM User Login Profile should exist and have PasswordResetRequired property set to true

files.expected_value: 'Resources.User.Properties' should be configured with LoginProfile with PasswordResetRequired property set to true

queries.description: EC2 Instances should be configured under a VPC network. AWS VPCs provide the controls to facilitate a formal process for approving and testing all network connections and changes to the firewall and router configurations.
EnableKeyRotation should not be false or undefined
AWS RDS backup retention policy should be at least 7 days

files.expected_value: The RDS DBInstance 'DefaultDB' resource has a minimum backup retention period of at least 7 days
files.actual_value: The RDS DBCluster 'DefaultDB' resource has backup retention period of '%!s(int=0)' which is less than the minimum of 7 days, and no RDS Cluster are defined

queries.description: AWS RDS Instance should have a multi-az deployment

files.expected_value: The RDS DBInstance 'DefaultDB' should have Multi-Availability Zone enabled
files.actual_value: The RDS DBInstance 'DefaultDB' has MultiAZ value set to false

queries.description: Make sure the AWS RDS configuration has automatic backup configured. If the retention period is equal to 0 there is no backup
NAT gateways are recommended, and not the default route which permits all traffic, in Route Tables.

files.expected_value: Resources.PublicRoute.Properties.DestinationCidrBlock is different from the default value
Resources.PrivateRoute02.Properties.DestinationCidrBlock is different from the default value
Resources.WebDefaultPublicRoute.Properties.DestinationCidrBlock is different from the default value
Resources.PrivateRoute01.Properties.DestinationCidrBlock is different from the default value

queries.query_name: S3 Bucket Should Have Bucket Policy
queries.description: Checks if S3 Bucket has the same name as a Bucket Policy, if it has, S3 Bucket has a Bucket Policy associated

files.expected_value: 'Resources.OperationsBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[OperationsBucket]' is the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket
files.actual_value: 'Resources.OperationsBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[OperationsBucket]' is not the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket

files.expected_value: 'Resources.DataBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[DataBucket]' is the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket
files.actual_value: 'Resources.DataBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[DataBucket]' is not the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket

files.expected_value: 'Resources.DataScienceBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[DataScienceBucket]' is the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket
files.actual_value: 'Resources.DataScienceBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[DataScienceBucket]' is not the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket

files.expected_value: 'Resources.FinancialsBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[FinancialsBucket]' is the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket
files.actual_value: 'Resources.FinancialsBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[FinancialsBucket]' is not the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket

files.expected_value: 'Resources.LogsBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[LogsBucket]' is the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket
files.actual_value: 'Resources.LogsBucket.Properties.BucketName' or 'Resources.[LogsBucket]' is not the same as an 'AWS::S3::BucketPolicy' Bucket

queries.description: S3 bucket should have versioning enabled
AWS Security Group Ingress CIDR should not be open to the world

files.expected_value: Resources.WebNodeSG.Properties.SecurityGroupIngress[0].CidrIp is not open to the world (0.0.0.0/0)
Resources.WebNodeSG.Properties.SecurityGroupIngress[1].CidrIp is not open to the world (0.0.0.0/0)
Resources.WebNodeSG.Properties.SecurityGroupIngress[2].CidrIp is not open to the world (0.0.0.0/0)

queries.description: VPC should have a Network Firewall associated

files.expected_value: 'Resources.WebVPC' is associated with a AWS Network Firewall
files.actual_value: 'Resources.WebVPC' is not associated with a AWS Network Firewall

files.expected_value: 'Resources.VPC' is associated with a AWS Network Firewall
files.actual_value: 'Resources.VPC' is not associated with a AWS Network Firewall

queries.description: A IAM user should belong to a group

queries.query_name: Lambda Function Without Dead Letter Queue
queries.description: AWS Lambda Function should be configured for a Dead Letter Queue(DLQ)
AWS Lambda functions should have TracingConfig enabled. For this, property 'tracingConfig.mode' should have the value 'Active'
RDS DBInstance should have deletion protection set to true
Server Access Logging must be enabled on S3 Buckets so that all changes are logged and trackable
AWS Security Group Rule should have description defined

AWS Shield Advanced should be used for Amazon Route 53 hosted zone, AWS Global Accelerator accelerator, Elastic IP Address, Elastic Load Balancing, and Amazon CloudFront Distribution to protect these resources against robust DDoS attacks

files.actual_value: Resources.NatGatewayEIP1 does not have shield advanced associated
Resources.NatGatewayEIP2 does not have shield advanced associated

queries.description: VPC hasn't got any FlowLog associated

files.expected_value: Resources.VPC has a FlowLogs resource associated
files.actual_value: Resources.VPC doesn't have a FlowLogs resource associated

queries.description: It's considered a best practice for an EC2 instance to use an EBS optimized instance. This provides the best performance for your EBS volumes by minimizing contention between Amazon EBS I/O and other traffic from your instance

files.expected_value: Resources.DBAppInstance.Properties to have EbsOptimized set to true.
files.actual_value: Resources.DBAppInstance.Properties doesn't have EbsOptimized set to true.

files.expected_value: Resources.EC2Instance.Properties to have EbsOptimized set to true.
files.actual_value: Resources.EC2Instance.Properties doesn't have EbsOptimized set to true.
